InstructionData.Title: Temp Management
InstructionData.Author: SMiLeY.NET
InstructionData.Instructions:
### Temp Management ### alias Self db alias GFGIn d0 alias GFGOut d1 alias GFGSensor d2 alias SterlingIn d3 alias SterlingOut d4 alias SterlingSensor d5
alias GFGTemp r0 alias GFGAboveTemp r1 alias SterlingTemp r2 alias SterlingAboveTemp r3 define TargetTemp 283.15
Main: yield jal HandleGFG jal HandleSterling j Main
HandleGFG: l GFGTemp GFGSensor Temperature sge GFGAboveTemp GFGTemp TargetTemp s GFGIn On GFGAboveTemp s GFGOut On GFGAboveTemp j ra
HandleSterling: l SterlingTemp SterlingSensor Temperature sge SterlingAboveTemp SterlingTemp TargetTemp s SterlingIn On SterlingAboveTemp s SterlingOut On SterlingAboveTemp j ra
